body.name: Ninja AF150AMZ Air Fryer XL, 5.5 Qt. Capacity that can Air Fry, Air Roast, Bake, Reheat & Dehydrate, with Dishwasher Safe, Nonstick Basket & Crisper Plate and a Chef-Inspired Recipe Guide, Grey
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 4 mins
features: XL CAPACITY: With the 5.5 qt. nonstick basket and crisper plate, you can save time by cooking up to 3 lbs. of French fries or wings with ease.
5-IN-1 VERSATILE FUNCTIONALITY: Includes 5 versatile cooking programs: Air Fry, Air Roast, Bake, Reheat, and Dehydrate. BPA free: Yes
LESS FAT: Up to 75% less fat than traditional air frying methods. Tested against hand-cut, deep-fried French fries.
EASY CLEANING: Both the basket and crisper plate are nonstick, easy-to-clean and dishwasher safe.
WIDE TEMPERATURE RANGE: 105°F to 400°F allows you to gently remove moisture from foods or quickly cook and crisp foods with convection heat.
DEHYDRATE: Create flat, chip like dehydrated foods for fun, homemade snacks pounds; The combination of low fan speed and low temperature enables thorough dehydration.
WHAT’S INCLUDED: 1750-Watt air fryer, 5.5 qt. nonstick basket, nonstick crisper plate and chef-inspired 20 recipe cookbook.
body.description: Meet the Ninja Air Fryer XL, a fast and easy way to cook your favorite foods. Cook and crisp 3 lbs of French fries or wings, using little to no oil, in a family-sized 5.5-qt basket. Create guilt-free fried favorites for the whole family! You can air fry, air roast, bake, reheat, and dehydrate for the ultimate versatility. Nonstick, nano-ceramic basket is easy to clean and dishwasher safe.Conoce a la Ninja Air Fryer XL, una forma rápida y fácil de cocinar tus alimentos favoritos. Cocine y crujiente 3 libras de patatas fritas o alas, usando poco o ningún aceite, en una cesta de 5.5 cuartos de galón. Crea favoritos fritos sin culpa para toda la familia! Puede freír, asar al aire, hornear, recalentar y deshidratar para la máxima versatilidad. La cesta antiadherente de nano-cerámica es fácil de limpiar y apta para lavavajillas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this arifryer. My children love it too. Easy to use. I like the various settings and versatility. Easy to clean also and it’s pretty spacious. I’ve cooked cornish hens and small pizzas (although the pizzas come out soggy so I have to figure out what I’m doing wrong)…. Overall love this air fryer. Worth the money and saves time!! The hens cooked quickly less than 20 minutes! Very efficient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What an amazing product
reviews.reviewText: Not sure what to say. I have a very expensive toaster oven air fryer from Breville which just struggles to toast or air fry. And after you do it splatters all over the inside and it's difficult to clean. It's more like cleaning an oven. I bought this ninja from Amazon warehouse with pretty low expectations. It's simple and simply amazing. It browns food in under 5 minutes compared to 15 to 20 min for the Breville. Because it works so quickly food doesn't dry out like it does in the Breville. The ninja reheats food in minutes. Not sure how this is possible because the Breville is rated to 465F and this ninja only goes to 400F!Since there are no direct heating elements, I can use a wax paper liner in the basket which makes cleaning even simpler. Using a liner other than foil is simply out of the question for the breville, you'd burn the house down. The entire ninja basket is non stick and dishwasher safe too and can be wiped and cleaned quickly with a damp sponge. Only problem is what other appliances I'm going to have to retire to make space for this ninja.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a christmas present for my boyfriend and he loves it! It heats up quickly and everything comes out nice and crispy. It doesn't beep super loud and has plenty of space to cook a decent amount. Nice looking appliance that can be kept out on the counter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice air frier plus
reviews.reviewText: Works well, easy to operate, cleans nicely in dishwasher, looks good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT AIR FRYER
reviews.reviewText: EASY TO USE. ESPECIALLY EASY TO CLEAN. WORKS GREAT. THE COOKING INSTRUCTIONS IN MY OPINION ARE PERFECT. I FOUND THE AIR FLYER COOKS QUICKER THAN THE RECOMMENDED COOKING TIMES. I HIGH RECOMMEND THIS AIR FRYER. IT IS BETTER THAN THE PHILLIPS AIR FRYER AT LESS THAN 1/2 OF THE COST.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Terrific product but round shape seems limiting
reviews.reviewText: A friend had one of these and sad she uses it every day so I got one and was excited to use it.First thing I noticed is while it is an amazing device it just seems too small for some things. Some bloggers said they bought one this size but then got a bigger one, and I see the square ones in lots of pics on Pinterest! the fact is you can fit more in a square shaped air fryer, and that is what I need apparently.We cooked two steaks in this and each end was closer to the sides and cooked more than the middles.I like making buttered toast in this! But the bread is so light the air fryer mode blows the pieces upside down so I got a wire rack and let the handles lay across the toast to keep the butter side up! It makes the best toast.As for French fried potatoes and sweet potatoes, it is ok but I like them in baked in the oven better.This is great for reheating pizza for sure!I am just not as crazy about this because, as I said, I find the round shape a bit limiting but it is a wonderful product, easy to clean and has some great features. We are thinking of using this one and getting a square shape air fryer, too, then we can cook some things in this one while cooking other things in the square one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NINJA AIR FRYER
reviews.reviewText: I love this! Works great. So easy to use. Great delivery, very quick even during the busy holiday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have had the Ninja Foodi flip-up toaster oven for several years now. It has an air fry function, and I always thought that was good enough. I cook many things in it, but most of the time, it seems to dry out the food. So, when this air fryer went on sale for Black Friday, I jumped on it. WHY didn't I buy one of these sooner?! This thing is truly amazing. I have had it for about a month and have cooked almost all of my meals in it since. Breakfast sausage, chicken thighs/breasts, eggs, potatoes/fries, you name it, this thing can cook it. It's easy to clean, too. There's not much else to say. Try it out!
Se compro en black friday a buen precio para luego valer el doble, sin duda la marca nnija otorga buenos resultados.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have never loved a gadget the way l love my fryer. It is perfect and it does the job. No need for oil any more.

La mejor compra! Súper fácil de usar y limpiar. Hay muchísimas recetas que pueden hacerse y todo queda espectacular con el mínimo de grasa.El producto llegó en perfecto estado, a tiempo y muy bien empacado. Lo recomiendo al 100!

reviews.reviewText: Se frie muy rápido la comida, sin necesidad de aceite
